body:
Comment 1 by **johan.samyn**: 
I have to change the description somewhat. I had to correct the environment var GOBIN on
my system, which lacked a '\' between '%GOROOT%' and 'bin' (now wondering why I didn't
have problems with that before).
Now the command to install gotour offline created folders '%GOROOT%' and therein 'bin'
in the folder from which I ran the go get command (...\%GOROOT%\bin\gotour.exe). So it
looks that the '%GOROOT%' part in GOBIN is not substituted. When I change the content of
GOBIN into 'C:\Programs\Go\bin' (instead of '%GOROOT%\bin') everything works well, which
confirms the above.
I see 2 solutions: (1) use GOROOT and append 'bin' or '\bin' to it instead of using
GOBIN, (2) make the installer code substitute any %...% parts in GOBIN. Of which (1) is
the easiest I think.
